text.content:
Paralyzed

  • Paralyzed creatures are @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.3CQC3JEY2C3Y721F]{Incapacitated} and cannot move or speak.
  • The creature automatically fails Strength (Save) and Dexterity (Save) checks.
  • Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.
  • Any attack that hits the creature is a critical hit if the attacker is within 5ft of the creature.
